00008 class align_w_preIK_data_t : public align_w_rigid_data_t{
00009 public:
00010   align_w_preIK_data_t() : align_w_rigid_data_t()
00011   { init(); }
00012 
00014   align_w_preIK_data_t(const align_w_preIK_data_t &other) 
00015    : align_w_rigid_data_t(other)
00016   {
00017     init();
00018     do_copy(other);
00019   }
00020 
00022   const align_w_preIK_data_t &
00023   operator=(const align_w_preIK_data_t &other)
00024   {
00025     if(&other != this){
00026       do_copy(other);
00027       align_w_rigid_data_t::operator= (other);
00028     }
00029     return *this;
00030   }
00031 
00033   virtual ~align_w_preIK_data_t()
00034   { ; }
00035 
00036   virtual void
00037   save_preIK_vals()
00038   {
00039     preIK_score = score;
00040     std::copy(R, R + 9, preIK_R);
00041     std::copy(T, T + 3, preIK_T);
00042     preIK_terms.resize(terms.size());
00043     std::copy(terms.begin(), terms.end(), preIK_terms.begin());
00044   }
00045 
00046   virtual void
00047   get_score_field_labels(std::vector<std::string> *fields,
00048                          const bool normalize_score) const
00049   {
00050     rigid_align_t::get_score_field_labels(fields, normalize_score);
00051     fields->push_back("Initial site atomic RMSD");
00052     fields->push_back("ICP site atomic RMSD");
00053     fields->push_back("Final site atomic RMSD");
00054   }
00055 
00056 
00057   virtual void
00058   write_score_fields(std::ostream& out, const uint orient_num,
00059                      const bool wrote_ligs, const std::string& ext_SF_id_in,
00060                      const std::string& struct_id,
00061                      const std::string& lig_id) const
00062   {
00063     // First write the base class's score lines
00064     align_w_rigid_data_t::write_score_fields(out, orient_num, wrote_ligs,
00065                                              ext_SF_id_in, struct_id, lig_id);
00066     out << "\n";
00067   
00068     out << "preIK_" << struct_id << "|";
00069 
00070     // Score is likely accurate to at best 2 or 3 decimal places 
00071     out << std::fixed << std::setprecision(3) << std::left << std::setfill(' ')
00072         << preIK_score << "|";
00073   
00074     // Transformation (rotation followed by translation) 
00075     out << std::fixed << std::setprecision(14);
00076     // Our rotation matrices are to be muliplied from the left by the 
00077     // positions, but the output matrices are for post multiplication by 
00078     // vectors
00079     std::string follower = "        |";
00080     for(size_t i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
00081       for(size_t j = 0; j < 3; ++j){
00082         out << preIK_R[3*j + i] << follower[3*i + j];
00083       }
00084     for(uint i = 0; i < 3; ++i) out << preIK_T[i] << follower[6 + i];
00085   
00086     out << "||";
00087   
00088     if(preIK_terms.size()){
00089       out << std::fixed << std::setprecision(7) << preIK_terms[0];
00090       for(size_t i = 1; i < preIK_terms.size(); ++i) 
00091         out << " " << preIK_terms[i];
00092     }
00093     out << "|" << std::fixed << std::setprecision(3);
00094 
00095     if(A_init_rmsd < my_float_max) out << A_init_rmsd;
00096     out << "|";
00097     if(A_ICP_rmsd < my_float_max) out << A_ICP_rmsd;
00098     out << "|";
00099     if(A_final_rmsd < my_float_max) out << A_final_rmsd;
00100     out << "|" << std::fixed << std::setprecision(7);
00101   }
00102 
00104 
00107   virtual void
00108   set_site_atomic_rmsd(const my_float_t rmsd, const size_t rmsd_type)
00109   {
00110     if(rmsd_type == 0) A_init_rmsd = rmsd;
00111     else if(rmsd_type == 1) A_ICP_rmsd = rmsd;
00112     else if(rmsd_type == 2) A_final_rmsd = rmsd; 
00113     else{
00114       std::cerr << "Error: unknown rmsd type -- should be 0-2\n";
00115     }
00116   }
00117

00143   my_float_t preIK_score;
00144   my_float_t preIK_R[9];
00145   my_float_t preIK_T[3];
00146   std::vector<my_float_t> preIK_terms;
00147 
00148 private:
00149   my_float_t A_init_rmsd;
00150   my_float_t A_ICP_rmsd;
00151   my_float_t A_final_rmsd; 
00152 
00153   void
00154   init()
00155   {
00156     preIK_score = my_float_max;
00157     std::fill(preIK_R, preIK_R + 9, 0.0);
00158     std::fill(preIK_T, preIK_T + 3, 0.0);
00159     A_init_rmsd = my_float_max;
00160     A_ICP_rmsd = my_float_max;
00161     A_final_rmsd = my_float_max;
00162   }
00163 
00164   void
00165   do_copy(const align_w_preIK_data_t &other)
00166   {
00167     preIK_score = other.preIK_score;
00168     std::copy(other.preIK_R, other.preIK_R + 9, preIK_R);
00169     std::copy(other.preIK_T, other.preIK_T + 3, preIK_T);
00170     preIK_terms.resize(other.preIK_terms.size());
00171     std::copy(other.preIK_terms.begin(), other.preIK_terms.end(),
00172               preIK_terms.begin());
00173     A_init_rmsd = other.A_init_rmsd;
00174     A_ICP_rmsd = other.A_ICP_rmsd;
00175     A_final_rmsd = other.A_final_rmsd;
00176   }
00177 };
